NAME: Drop Baby
DESCRIPTION: 1,000m passed. What were you expecting, a medal?

NAME: Drop Newbie
DESCRIPTION: 2,500m passed. You're almost worthy of this game.

NAME: Dropomatic
DESCRIPTION: 5,000m passed. That wasn’t so tinny after all.

NAME: Drop King
DESCRIPTION: 10,000m passed. Ewww, look at me I'm the king of the castle.

NAME: Drop Kick
DESCRIPTION: 50,000m passed. This game won’t help your career. Give up now!..

NAME: Chump Change
DESCRIPTION: 100 coins collected in a single game. Don't spend it all at once

NAME: Zimbabwean Millionaire
DESCRIPTION: 500 coins collected in a single game. Worth about 20 cents in Zimbabwe... your shout.

NAME: Johnny Flash Pants
DESCRIPTION: 1,000 coins collected in single game. Watch out for tall poppy syndrome.

NAME: Cashed Up Bogan
DESCRIPTION:
2,500 coins collected in single game. 
10k and an oversized spoiler should do the trick.

NAME: The Wolf of Fall St.
DESCRIPTION:
10,000 coins collected in single game. 
We want to make a movie about your fall. Lols.

NAME: Hat trick
DESCRIPTION: Logged in 3 days in a row. The best way to spend your long weekend.

NAME: Maverick
DESCRIPTION: Logged in 4 days in a row. You need to de-tech pronto, before your relationships suffer.

NAME: Addict
DESCRIPTION: Logged in 5 days in a row. Got the shakes? Turn vibrations off on your phone!

NAME: The Holy Snail
DESCRIPTION: Activate 5 Slo-mo power-ups. What are you waiting for? A medal?

NAME: Blackhole Award
DESCRIPTION: Activate 10 Vac Pac power-ups. You suck majorly.

NAME: Lord of the Counterfeiters
DESCRIPTION: Activate 25 Coin Multiplier power-ups. You’re a walking license to print money.

NAME: So fresh and so clean, clean
DESCRIPTION: Purchase 1 fashion item. About time you changed that outfit, phew!

NAME: Fashion Victim
DESCRIPTION: Purchase 3 fashion items. It’s skydiving, not a catwalk.

NAME: Wardrobe Junkie
DESCRIPTION: Purchase 4 fashion items. Congratulations, you’re like the Imelda Marcos of dropping.

NAME: The Luck Award
DESCRIPTION: 1 prize claimed. You da man! (Or lady). (Or ladyman).

NAME: Flukey-fluke pants
DESCRIPTION: 3 prizes claimed.  You can make a new friend or two with that bounty.

NAME: Mr Winning
DESCRIPTION: 5 prizes claimed.

NAME: Hoovers and the Shakers
DESCRIPTION: 1st Coin Vacuum upgraded in shop. Basically, you suck... eggs.

NAME: Granny Diver
DESCRIPTION: 2nd Slo-mo Sloth upgraded in shop. So slow, you’re almost in reverse.

NAME: Greed Meister
DESCRIPTION: 3rd Coin Multiplier upgraded in shop. More coins than if Jay-Z were busking.

NAME: Wright Bros
DESCRIPTION: Pass threshold & submit 1 score. You’re making history, just by crashing to earth. Too easy.

NAME: Tiger Moth
DESCRIPTION: Pass threshold & submit 10 scores. More moth, than tiger but hey, it’s all flying.

NAME: Don Juan
DESCRIPTION: Pass threshold & submit 100 scores. You really are very good at scoring.

NAME: Goose & Maverick
DESCRIPTION: Pass threshold & submit 500 scores. Like Top Gun, only not as cool.

NAME: Drop God
DESCRIPTION: Pass threshold & submit 1000 scores. We got nothing. All hail you.
